attributes.action: Resign in favour of Mr T
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Isles have suffered at the hands of fools for long enough, its time for the T to pity those fools. In addition he will reinstate the free milk in schools initiative and of course when it comes to America he will infact predict 'pain'. Please be aware that any overseas summits had better not include 'gettin' on no plane'

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
